parameters: Fade out the screen and show the black bars for the cinematic effect.
Since we aren't using the player, we're going to need to halt
his movement and prevent menu opening, to do this we can simply
use a switch. Without this happening, the player can click to
move the player which will reveal the box-clicky thing
switch to stop movement and prevent opening menu
Change the blank events to mimick our party, set their location, and
make our current party hidden. Uncheck "wait for completion" in set movement
change screens tint and start a screen scroll, then fade in
First, we'll tint it all the way black to make the smooth
Now we fade in the screen to the desired color for 120 frames, or 2 seconds
Move the new party to the left, just before the baddy jumps down
and stops them. Uncheck wait for completion once again and estimate
or playtest to find out how many frames you'll need to wait before
the next action. We want harold to face Therese before she's done moving.
This can also be done in set move rout for harold, but either way works
For therese's last step, we're going to make her walk a bit
We start the dialogue. Make sure the window is transparent, and
you only use the 2 bottom lines of text. We're going to use show
picture to slide in the emotes
-- Start the picture at 734 x and 530 y
Slide it to 730 x and 530 y for about 20 frames, don't wait for
Deer is filled the Princes' soldiers we need to clear it out. \|\|\^

\n<Kent> Yes its quite a smart riddle isnt it.
\n<Kent> If it were nothing I wouldnt ask the riddle.
\n<Kent> I will have to find more.
\n<Martin> I remember it like it was yesterday.
\n<Martin> The day Deer was invaded by the Princes Army.
I was working in the blacksmiths when soldiers
came and enfroced their rule upon us. They
killed anyone who opposed them. It was quite
\n<Martin> sad I lost my brother because of that invasion.
\n<Cedric> Ah I am sorry for your loss Im sure that
this will all come to an end soon.
\n<Martin> I just want my brother back.

Richard, how long are you going to pretend that this relationship you - \|\|\^
- have with Jolicia is acceptable? You are betrothed to Reyanah. \|\|\^
I thought I could be happy with Reyanah but when I saw Jolicia I knew - \|\|\^
- she was special. Special to me. \|\|\^
I know, but I’ve always done the right thing, I’ve always been the noble - \|\|\^
- one. If there is anything this war has taught me is no one cares - \|\|\^
- if you do the morally right thing, no one cares if you act with honour - \|\|\^
- and dignity. They only care that you win. I don’t want to do the right thing - \|\|\^
- anymore, I just want to be with Jolicia. \|\|\^
I understand how you feel Richard we have suffered together. But we - \|\|\^
- need to rebuild and Reyanah is needed to do that. Their family is - \|\|\^
- powerful and has the resources we need to bring Haffenden back from - \|\|\^
- destruction. Let’s not discuss this anymore, I just hope you think - \|\|\^
- about your decision and how it affects everyone, think about what mother - \|\|\^
\n<Zuzana Deems>My sister has been missing for days. I fear
\n<Cedric>Kidnapped? That is a problem. I'll look for
her for you. Can you tell me about her?
\n<Zuzana Deems>Yes she is blond last wearing pink and
\n<Zuzana Deems>Thank the Gods, thank you so much. You
found my sister. I thought you were dead.
\n<Ursula Deems>Zuzana, I thought I was going to die.
\n<Zuzana Deems>You really brought her back to me.
\n<Cedric>This is interesting, I saw a man earlier
with the same blade. I wonder if they're

a while. He is legendary! You should go and
meet him he might even train you.
\n<Cedric>I guess I should check it out.
\n<Annis Bretel>Cedric Haffenden, I have heard of your
skills. I need a favor from you.

It's just that I dont need that on my
